files.content: ## [1.1.3](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3) (2018-05-24) ### Bug Fixes * **build:** ‰øÆÂ§çÂ∫ìËæìÂá∫ÁöÑÂÖ•Âè£Êñá‰ª∂dist/vue-lazy-component.jsÂåÖÂê´constÂÖ≥ÈîÆÂ≠óÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò ([7b852e8](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/7b852e8)), closes [#10](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/issues/10) # [1.1.0](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/v1.0.10...v1.1.0) (2017-10-18) ### Code Refactoring * **ssr:** support ssr ([848f0c6](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/848f0c6)) ### BREAKING CHANGES * **ssr:** transition style should require '@xunlei/vue-lazy-component/src/transition.css' ## [1.0.10](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/v1.0.9...v1.0.10) (2017-10-17) ### Features * **ssr:** suport ssr ([b682fae](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/b682fae)) ## [1.0.6](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/v1.0.5...v1.0.6) (2017-09-14) ### Features * **component:** make prop viewport working ([5a1db8a](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/5a1db8a)) ## [1.0.5](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/v1.0.4...v1.0.5) (2017-09-13) ### Bug Fixes * **observer:** make observer more sensitive ([c7fa734](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/c7fa734)) ## [1.0.4](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4) (2017-09-13) ### Bug Fixes * **observer:** fix observer callback didn't exec ([d67f15e](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/d67f15e)) ## [1.0.3](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3) (2017-09-13) ### Bug Fixes * **observer:** no isIntersecting bug ([5e7c349](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/5e7c349)) ## [1.0.2](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2) (2017-09-12) ## [1.0.1](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/compare/4738b55...v1.0.1) (2017-09-12) ### Bug Fixes * **demo:** fix demo highlight bug ([7b67c74](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/7b67c74)) * **demo:** rebuild demo page ([9868912](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/9868912)) * **observer:** fix observer bug ([9fa8a45](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/9fa8a45)) ### Features * **main:** Add chunks example ([3518f4e](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/3518f4e)) * **main:** first version ([4738b55](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/commit/4738b55)) ### BREAKING CHANGES * **main:** ÊîØÊåÅ ÁªÑÂèØËßÅÊàñÂç≥Â∞ÜÂèØËßÅÊó∂ÊáíÂä†ËΩΩ

files.name: README.en.md
files.content:
# Vue Lazy Component


[![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@xunlei/vue-lazy-component.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@xunlei/vue-lazy-component)
[![Commitizen friendly](https://img.shields.io/badge/commitizen-friendly-brightgreen.svg)](http://commitizen.github.io/cz-cli/)
[![Git flow work flow](https://img.shields.io/badge/git--flow-workflow-brightgreen.svg)](https://github.com/nvie/gitflow/)
[![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component.svg)](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/stargazers)
[![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component.svg)](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/issues)
[![GitHub forks](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component.svg)](https://github.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/network)
[![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component/master/LICENSE)

> üêå Vue.js 2.x component level lazy loading component


## Features

- Support load component when componet visible or will soon be visible
- Support load compoent for time delay
- Support load skeleton component before real component load to improve the user experience
- Support code split to load components asynchronously

## Installation
```
npm install @xunlei/vue-lazy-component
```

## Online demo

https://xunleif2e.github.io/vue-lazy-component/demo/dist/index.html

## Usage

### Registration

#### Use plugin to register a global component

```javascript
import VueLazyComponent from '@xunlei/vue-lazy-component'
import Vue from 'vue'

Vue.use(VueLazyComponent)
```
#### Local Registration

```javascript
import { component as VueLazyComponent } from '@xunlei/vue-lazy-component'

export default {
  // ...
  components: {
    'vue-lazy-component': VueLazyComponent
  }
}
```

####  Direct `<script>` Include
>  The premise is that Vue is also use direct `<script>` include.

```html
<script src="https://unpkg.com/@xunlei/vue-lazy-component@1.0.7/dist/vue-lazy-component.js"></script>
```

### Template syntax
```html
 <vue-lazy-component
  @init="init"
  @beforeInit="beforeInit"
 >
  <!-- real component-->
  <st-series-sohu/>
  <!-- skeleton component -->
  <st-series-sohu-skeleton slot="skeleton"/>
</vue-lazy-component>
```

## Props
| Parameter                    | Description  | Type | Optional | Default value |
|-------------------------|-------|------|--------|--------|
| viewport | Viewport where componet is in. Default is the window viewport.| HTMLElement | true      | `null` means window viewport |
| direction | Direction of the viewport scolls. `vertical` or  `horizontal` | String | true      | `vertical` |
| threshold | Threshold of preload, in css synax. | String | true      | `0px` |
| tagName | Tag name of the wrapper element.  | String | true  | `div` |
| timeout | Delay time. If set this, whether visible or not, automatically load after the specified time  | Number | true    | - |

## Events

| Event Name                    | Description  | Args
|-------------------------|-------|------|
| before-init | Component visible or delayed cut-off caused to begin loading the real component. | - |
| init | Start to load real componet | - |
| before-enter | Real component begin enter | el |
| before-leave | Skeleton component begin leave | el |
| after-leave | Skeleton component leaved | el |
| after-enter | Real component entered | el |
| after-init |  Initialization is complete | - |

## Notes

> 1. The project relies on [IntersectionObserver API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Intersection_Observer_API). To run in an earlier version of the browser, you need to include **IntersectionObserver API polyfill**

### IntersectionObserver API polyfill

https://github.com/w3c/IntersectionObserver/tree/master/polyfill

> 2. Using `Scoped Component Slots` require Vue 2.1.0+

- https://vuejs.org/v2/guide/components.html#Scoped-Slots

## Development Setup

``` bash
# install deps
npm install

# serve demo at localhost:8080
npm run dev

# build library and demo
npm run build

# build library
npm run build:library

# build demo
npm run build:demo

# commit use commitizen
npm run commit

# pre publish
npm run prepublish

# generate changelog
npm run changelog
```
## License

[MIT](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

Copyright (c) 2017 XunleiF2E

> üêå Vue.js 2.x ÁªÑ‰ª∂Á∫ßÊáíÂä†ËΩΩÊñπÊ°à

## [English version documentation](README.en.md)


## ÁâπÊÄß

- ÊîØÊåÅ ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂèØËßÅÊàñÂç≥Â∞ÜÂèØËßÅÊó∂ÊáíÂä†ËΩΩ
- ÊîØÊåÅ ÁªÑ‰ª∂Âª∂Êó∂Âä†ËΩΩ
- ÊîØÊåÅ Âä†ËΩΩÁúüÂÆûÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂâçÂ±ïÁ§∫È™®Êû∂ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÔºåÊèêÈ´òÁî®Êà∑‰ΩìÈ™å
- ÊîØÊåÅ ÁúüÂÆûÁªÑ‰ª∂‰ª£Á†ÅÂàÜÂåÖÂºÇÊ≠•Âä†ËΩΩ

## ÂÆâË£Ö / Installation

```
npm install @xunlei/vue-lazy-component
```

## Âú®Á∫ødemo / Online demo

https://xunleif2e.github.io/vue-lazy-component/demo/dist/index.html

## ‰ΩøÁî®

### 1. Ê≥®ÂÜåÁªÑ‰ª∂

#### ÊñπÂºè1 Âà©Áî®Êèí‰ª∂ÊñπÂºèÂÖ®Â±ÄÊ≥®ÂÜå

```javascript
import VueLazyComponent from '@xunlei/vue-lazy-component'
import Vue from 'vue'

Vue.use(VueLazyComponent)
```

#### ÊñπÂºè2 Â±ÄÈÉ®Ê≥®ÂÜå

```javascript
import { component as VueLazyComponent } from '@xunlei/vue-lazy-component'

export default {
  // ...
  components: {
    'vue-lazy-component': VueLazyComponent
  }

```

#### ÊñπÂºè3 Áã¨Á´ãÁâàÊú¨ÂºïÂÖ•ÔºåËá™Âä®ÂÖ®Â±ÄÊ≥®ÂÜå

> ÂâçÊèêÊòØ vue ‰πüÊòØÁã¨Á´ãÁâàÊú¨ÈÄöËøáscriptÊ†áÁ≠æÂºïÂÖ•

```html
<script src="https://unpkg.com/@xunlei/vue-lazy-component@1.0.7/dist/vue-lazy-component.js"></script>
```

### 2. Ê®°ÁâàËØ≠Ê≥ï

```html
 <vue-lazy-component
  @init="init"
  @beforeInit="beforeInit"
 >
  <!-- real component-->
  <st-series-sohu/>
  <!-- skeleton component -->
  <st-series-sohu-skeleton slot="skeleton"/>
</vue-lazy-component>
```

## Props

| ÂèÇÊï∞                    | ËØ¥Êòé  | Á±ªÂûã | ÂèØÈÄâÂÄº | ÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº |
|-------------------------|-------|------|--------|--------|
| viewport | ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑËßÜÂè£ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊòØÂú®È°µÈù¢ÂÆπÂô®ÂÜÖÊªöÂä®ÔºåËßÜÂè£Â∞±ÊòØËØ•ÂÆπÂô® | HTMLElement | true      | `null`Ôºå‰ª£Ë°®ËßÜÁ™ó |
| direction | ËßÜÂè£ÁöÑÊªöÂä®ÊñπÂêë, `vertical`‰ª£Ë°®ÂûÇÁõ¥ÊñπÂêëÔºå`horizontal`‰ª£Ë°®Ê∞¥Âπ≥ÊñπÂêë  | String | true      | `vertical` |
| threshold | È¢ÑÂä†ËΩΩÈòàÂÄº, cssÂçï‰Ωç  | String | true      | `0px` |
| tagName | ÂåÖË£πÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÂ§ñÂ±ÇÂÆπÂô®ÁöÑÊ†áÁ≠æÂêç  | String | true  | `div` |
| timeout | Á≠âÂæÖÊó∂Èó¥ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊåáÂÆö‰∫ÜÊó∂Èó¥Ôºå‰∏çËÆ∫ÂèØËßÅ‰∏éÂê¶ÔºåÂú®ÊåáÂÆöÊó∂Èó¥‰πãÂêéËá™Âä®Âä†ËΩΩ  | Number | true    | - |

## Events

| ‰∫ã‰ª∂Âêç                    | ËØ¥Êòé  | ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂèÇÊï∞
|-------------------------|-------|------|
| before-init | Ê®°ÂùóÂèØËßÅÊàñÂª∂Êó∂Êà™Ê≠¢ÂØºËá¥ÂáÜÂ§áÂºÄÂßãÂä†ËΩΩÊáíÂä†ËΩΩÊ®°Âùó | - |
| init | ÂºÄÂßãÂä†ËΩΩÊáíÂä†ËΩΩÊ®°ÂùóÔºåÊ≠§Êó∂È™®Êû∂ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂºÄÂßãÊ∂àÂ§± | - |
| before-enter | ÊáíÂä†ËΩΩÊ®°ÂùóÂºÄÂßãËøõÂÖ• | el |
| before-leave | È™®Êû∂ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂºÄÂßãÁ¶ªÂºÄ | el |
| after-leave | È™®Êû∂ÁªÑ‰ª∂Â∑≤ÁªèÁ¶ªÂºÄ | el |
| after-enter | ÊáíÂä†ËΩΩÊ®°Âø´Â∑≤ÁªèËøõÂÖ• | el |
| after-init | ÂàùÂßãÂåñÂÆåÊàê | - |

## Ê≥®ÊÑè / Notes

> 1. ËØ•È°πÁõÆ‰æùËµñ [IntersectionObserver API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Intersection_Observer_API)ÔºåÂ¶ÇÈúÄÂú®ËæÉ‰ΩéÁâàÊú¨ÊµèËßàÂô®ËøêË°åÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÂºïÂÖ• **IntersectionObserver API polyfill**

### IntersectionObserver API polyfill

https://github.com/w3c/IntersectionObserver/tree/master/polyfill


> 2. webpack ÂàÜÂåÖÂºÇÊ≠•Âä†ËΩΩÊñπÂºè‰æùËµñ `Scoped Component Slots`, ÈúÄË¶Å Vue ÁâàÊú¨Â§ß‰∫é2.1.0


- https://cn.vuejs.org/v2/guide/components.html#‰ΩúÁî®ÂüüÊèíÊßΩ

## Development Setup

``` bash

npm install

# serve demo at localhost:8080
npm run dev

# build library and demo
npm run build

# build library
npm run build:library

# build demo
npm run build:demo

# commit use commitizen

```

## Roadmap

- [x] SSR ÊîØÊåÅ @ v1.1.0

- [ ] UIÂçïÂÖÉÊµãËØï @ v1.2.0

files.name: package.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "@xunlei/vue-lazy-component",
  "description": "Vue.js 2.0 ÁªÑ‰ª∂Á∫ßÊáíÂä†ËΩΩÊñπÊ°à Vue.js 2.x component level lazy loading solution",
  "version": "1.1.3",
  "private": false,
  "main": "dist/vue-lazy-component.js",
  "files": [
    "dist/*.js",
    "src"
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git@github.com:xunleif2e/vue-lazy-component.git"
  },
  "unpkg": "dist/vue-lazy-component.js",
  "keywords": [
    "vue.js",
    "vue-plugin",
    "vue-component"
  ],
  "author": "ËµµÂÖµ",
  "license": "MIT",
  "homepage": "https://zhaobing.site",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "node build/dev-server.js",
    "build": "npm run build:library && npm run build:demo",
    "build:demo": "node build/build.js",
    "build:library": "webpack --config build/webpack.lib.conf.js",
    "commit": "git-cz",
    "prepublish": "npm run build",
    "changelog": "conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "autoprefixer": "^6.7.2",
    "babel-cli": "^6.14.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.22.1",
    "babel-loader": "^6.2.10",
    "babel-plugin-external-helpers": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-runtime": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.13.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015-rollup": "^1.2.0",
    "babel-preset-stage-2": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-register": "^6.22.0",
    "chalk": "^1.1.3",
    "commitizen": "^2.9.6",
    "connect-history-api-fallback": "^1.3.0",
    "conventional-changelog-cli": "^1.3.3",
    "copy-webpack-plugin": "^4.0.1",
    "css-loader": "^0.28.0",
    "cz-conventional-changelog": "^2.0.0",
    "eventsource-polyfill": "^0.9.6",
    "express": "^4.14.1",
    "extract-text-webpack-plugin": "^2.0.0",
    "file-loader": "^0.11.1",
    "friendly-errors-webpack-plugin": "^1.1.3",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "^2.28.0",
    "http-proxy-middleware": "^0.17.3",
    "opn": "^4.0.2",
    "optimize-css-assets-webpack-plugin": "^1.3.0",
    "ora": "^1.2.0",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.0",
    "rollup": "^0.35.10",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^2.6.1",
    "rollup-plugin-uglify": "^1.0.1",
    "semver": "^5.3.0",
    "shelljs": "^0.7.6",
    "url-loader": "^0.5.8",
    "vue": "^2.3.3",
    "vue-loader": "^12.1.0",
    "vue-router": "^2.3.1",
    "vue-style-loader": "^3.0.1",
    "vue-template-compiler": "^2.3.3",
    "webpack": "^2.6.1",
    "webpack-dev-middleware": "^1.10.0",
    "webpack-hot-middleware": "^2.18.0",
    "webpack-merge": "^4.1.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">= 4.0.0",
    "npm": ">= 3.0.0"
  },
  "browserslist": [
    "> 1%",
    "last 2 versions",
    "not ie <= 8"
  ],
  "config": {
    "commitizen": {
      "path": "./node_modules/cz-conventional-changelog"
    }
  }
}
